title: Update mobile number label to 'Reg. Mobile No.'

requirements.summary: Update ContactSection to display mobile number with 'Reg. Mobile No.' prefix instead of 'Mob. No.'
acceptanceCriteria: The contact information display shows 'Reg. Mobile No.7079860205' for the phone number
The email continues to display as 'gmail-thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com' with the gmail- prefix
No other contact information formatting is changed

file_operations.description: Update the phone number display logic to use 'Reg. Mobile No.' prefix instead of 'Mob. No.' when rendering the contact information. Locate the section where contactInfo.phone is displayed and change the label from 'Mob. No.' to 'Reg. Mobile No.' while preserving the existing email formatting with 'gmail-' prefix and all other contact information display logic.
